title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients: Filling: 3 lbs ripe peaches sliced, ½ cup sugar, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1 tsp vanilla, ¼ tsp almond extract
Topping: 1½ cups flour, ⅓ cup sugar + extra, 1½ tsp baking powder, ¼ tsp salt, 6 tbsp cold butter cubed, ½ cup heavy cream
steps: Toss peaches with sugar, cornstarch, extracts. Pour into 9x13 dish.
Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, salt. Cut in butter until pea-sized.
Add cream, stir until just combined.
Drop biscuit dough over filling in mounds. Sprinkle with sugar.
Bake until golden and bubbling, 45-55 minutes.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
notes: Don't spread dough - leave it chunky.
